amendment.description: To increase funding for rail and transit security grants.

action.text: Amendment SA 3656 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 3656 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 43 - 51. Record Vote Number: 181.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 3656.
Amendment SA 3656 proposed by Senator Schumer. (consideration: CR S9204-9205; text: CR S9204) To increase funding for rail and transit security grants.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 3656 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 43 - 51. Record Vote Number: 181.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3656 proposed by Senator Schumer.
